name: voice-notes-interview-app
description: Voice transcription and AI-powered interview assistant

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix websocket-server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:websocket"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && CI=false npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && CI=false npm run build
